medea1.speech: Hello there strangers, may I ask why are you here?
Hello there, my name is Jason and it is a pleasure to meet a beauty such as yourself, we are here on a heroic quest from a city called lolcus
A long and weary quest for heroes, I am Medea daughter of King Aetios I hope your journey found you well
An arduous adventure to reclaim my fathers throne from my treacherous uncle...
WHO ARE THESE STRANGE MEN WHO INVADE MY HALLS?
I am Jason, son of Aeson. I am here to retrieve the golden fleece as a challenge set by my uncle

So you have come from a city I have not heard of, on the challenge of a man I do not know.
 Foreign lies to take MY THRONE!
Father please, his uncle has usurped his father as king, why would a stranger travel so far for a throne so foreign without an army?
My uncle King Pelias challenged me to deem my worth, I must return with the fleece so my people know who is the true champion of lolcus!
A challenge of worth? And you believe thee worthy of my fleece? Very well let us see your worth I give thee challenge three!
First you must plow the fields with 2 fire breathing golden hoofed bulls
Second you must sow the field with dragons teeth and slay the army that arises
Third, you must defeat the dragon guarding the fleece within the garden
If you complete these three tasks then you have my permission to take the fleece
Challenge accepted, I have not come this far to turn back now
Very well stranger, I look forward to watching this
Meet me at the shrine of Hecate outside the city

aetios3.speech: I see you have come to fulfil your challenge, very well to the fields! The bulls await!
